oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The cooperative conundrum: Idealizations and realities in today's classrooms
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A concise reflection on the feasibility of implementing cooperative work in real-life environments nowadays, conceived from both a theoretical and an empirical perspective through the analysis of two different papers referring to the topic: the first one on a project-based approach, and the second one on a task-based approach.
